files.content:
import { Slash } from "lucide-react";
import {
  Breadcrumb,
  BreadcrumbItem,
  BreadcrumbLink,
  BreadcrumbList,
  BreadcrumbPage,
  BreadcrumbSeparator,
} from "@/components/ui/breadcrumb";

export const title = "Breadcrumb with Slash Separator";

const Example = () => (
  <Breadcrumb>
    <BreadcrumbList>
      <BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbLink href="/">Home</BreadcrumbLink>
      </BreadcrumbItem>
      <BreadcrumbSeparator>
        <Slash />
      </BreadcrumbSeparator>
      <BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbLink href="/components">Components</BreadcrumbLink>
      </BreadcrumbItem>
      <BreadcrumbSeparator>
        <Slash />
      </BreadcrumbSeparator>
      <BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbPage>Breadcrumb</BreadcrumbPage>
      </BreadcrumbItem>
    </BreadcrumbList>
  </Breadcrumb>
);

export default Example;
